original_text: But thou, Bethlehem Ephratah, though thou be little among the thousands of Judah, yet out of thee shall he come forth unto me that is to be ruler in Israel; whose goings forth have been from of old, from everlasting.
korean_text: 베들레헴 에브라다야 너는 유다 족속 중에 작을지라도 이스라엘을 다스릴 자가 네게서 내게로 나올 것이라 그의 근본은 상고에, 영원에 있느니라

sentences.original_text: though thou be little among the thousands of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 유다의 여러 성읍 중에 작을지라도

sentences.original_text: yet out of thee shall he come forth unto me
sentences.korean_translation: 너에게서 나를 위하여 한 통치자가 나오리니

sentences.original_text: that is to be ruler in Israel
whose goings forth have been from of old
